title: React-Portfolio
role: Student, University of Oregon Full Stack Bootcamp
description: The portfolio website you are viewing was built and designed by me from scratch. This website is a Single-Page application built using React, with BootStrap styling elements from the ReactStrap Node Package.

title: QuoteGoat
role: Student, University of Oregon Full Stack Bootcamp
description: Quote Goat is a collaborative project that allows users to save and categorize their own quotes/'isms to their account. Others can then up-vote their favorites by category.

title: Day Tripper
description: Plan your day in your hometown or a city you are traveling to. Get a list of events and restaurants from Ticketmaster API and Zomato Api.

title: Burger
role: Student, University of Oregon Full Stack Bootcamp
description: A standard app in bootcamps, Burger takes input for a burger name and stores it in the SQL database until you click the user clicks the button to eat it, when it is stored in a list of eaten burgers.

title: WeatherChecker
description: This is a standard weather app, which give a 5 day forecast as well as current weather, using the OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Student Quiz
description: Here, I provide a timed quiz that tracks scores for testers' knowledge of basic coding and save the top scores to local storage.

title: Password Generator
description: Input your required password parameters and receive a randomly generated password.

title: HTML Builder
description: An application uses OOP and node.js commands in terminal that takes in information about employees and generates an HTML page that displays summary cantact details for different employees.
